1: <pb/><t>A in tic, nivan val ix aj vab'an syail yuj yoval sc'ol Dios.</t>
2: <t>Ix in spechb'at d'a scal q'uic'alq'uinal b'aj juneln̈ej q'uic'olinac. Ix in yac' b'ey d'a yoltac b'e b'aj malaj saquilq'uinal.</t>
3: <t>Masanil c'u ichan̈ej tic in smac'an yed' yoval sc'ool.</t>
4: <t>Ix yac' ichamax in nivanil, choc'xon̈ej ix yutejcanb'at in b'aquil.</t>
5: <t>Ix in smacchej yed' yaelal yed' cusc'olal.</t>
6: <t>Ix in yac' aj d'a scal q'uic'alq'uinal, icha yaj eb' chamnacxo.</t>
7: <t>Ix in smacchej b'aj man̈xa b'aj syal veli. Yed' val q'uen nivac cadena ix in stzec'a'.</t>
8: <t>Vach'chom tz'el vav in c'anan scolval, max scha yab' tas tzin c'an d'ay.</t>
9: <t>Ix smac in b'e yed' q'uen q'ueen, yuj chi' axon̈ej d'a q'uex b'e tzin b'ati.</t>
10: <t>Lajan ix yutej sb'a Jehová d'ayin icha junoc noc' oso sc'ub'ejel sb'a, icha junoc noc' choj tz'elta jucnaj d'ayin.</t>
11: <t>Ix in sn̈erel d'a yol b'e yic choc' tzin yutejcanb'ati, ix in actajcan yuuj.</t>
12: <t>Ix sb'o'och sjul-lab', ix can ijan d'ayin yed' sjul-lab' chi'.</t>
13: <t>A sjul-lab' ix sjulcot d'ayin, ix c'axpaj d'a yol in c'ool.</t>
14: <t>Masanil eb' vetanimail sb'uchvaj d'ayin, a inxon̈ej tzin yal eb' d'a scal slolonel.</t>
15: <t>D'a val syaelal ix in ajec' yuj Dios. Te c'a' tas ix yac' vuq'uej.</t>
16: <t>Ix el vecnaj q'uen ve ayic ix in em latnaj d'a sat lum yuuj, ix in can telan d'a cal pococ.</t>
17: <t>Man̈xalaj in junc'olal, man̈xo naanoc tzalajc'olal vuuj.</t>
18: <t>Svalani to man̈xa in tec'anil, yujto man̈xo ayococh Jehová yipoc in c'ool.</t>
19: <t>A tzin naancot in cuselal yed' vec' in ch'ocojil, te ya svab'i.</t>
20: <t>A val yic tzin naancot juntzan̈ chi', man̈xo animaoc tzin aj svab'i.</t>
21: <t>Palta ay jun tas tzin nib'ej, ayn̈ejec' d'a in pensar, aton jun chi' in gana svac'n̈ejoch yipoc in c'ool.</t>
22: <t>Aton val yuj svach'c'olal Jehová max on̈ sateli, yujto tz'oc'n̈ej sc'ool d'ayon̈.</t>
23: <t>Junjun q'uin̈ib'alil scheclaj svach'c'olal Jehová, syaln̈ej cac'anoch d'a co c'ool.</t>
24: <t>Yuj chi' svala' to icha in macb'en yaj Jehová, an̈ej ayoch yipoc in c'ool.</t>
25: <t>A eb' tz'ac'anoch Jehová d'a sc'ool, te vach' Jehová chi' d'a eb', aton eb' to sb'ec val och sb'a d'a yol sc'ab'.</t>
26: <t>Te vach' tato numan tzon̈ aj co tan̈vani masanto scolvaj Jehová d'ayon̈.</t>
27: <t>Yelxo vach' tato ayic unin animaon̈to scac'anoch co b'a d'a yalan̈ smandar Dios.</t>
28: <t>Vach' tato numan tzon̈ aj co ch'ocoj yacb'an syac'och co yaelal Jehová.</t>
29: <t>Yovalil tzon̈ och ejmelal, tzon̈ em n̈ojan d'a sat luum, talaj tz'oc' sc'ol Jehová d'ayon̈.</t>
30: <t>Vach'chom tzon̈ mac'ji, tzon̈ b'uchji, palta co chaocab'i.</t>
32: <t>Vach'chom syac'och co yaelal, palta tz'oc'pax sc'ool d'ayon̈, yujto te nivan svach'c'olal.</t>
33: <t>Val yel malaj sgana syac'och co cusc'olal yed' co yaelal.</t>
34: <t>A Jehová Dios Axon̈ej Ochi, malaj sgana tz'ixtaj eb' anima d'a preso,</t>
35: <t>malaj pax sgana tz'ic'jiel sderecho eb' ac'b'il yuuj.</t>
36: <t>Man̈ vach'oc d'a sat Dios tato max ch'olb'itaj eb' anima d'a stojolal.</t>
37: <t>Max elc'ochlaj tas sco na' tato man̈oc Jehová tz'alani.</t>
38: <t>Max javilaj vach'ilal ma yaelal, tato man̈oc Dios Axon̈ej Och tz'alani.</t>
39: <t>¿Tas yuj chuc scab'i tato yuj co chucal syac' co yaelal Dios?</t>
40: <t>Co b'eyc'olejec val co b'a sic'lab'il, chajtil yilji co b'eyb'al, scac'anxioch co b'a d'a yol sc'ab' Jehová.</t>
41: <t>Caq'uecb'at co pensar d'a Dios aj satchaan̈, scalan d'a co lesal icha tic:</t>
42: <t>Ix och co mul, ix co pitej co b'a d'ayach, maj on̈ ac' nivanc'olal.</t>
43: <t>Ix javi yoval a c'ol d'ayon̈, ix on̈ a pechani, ix on̈ a sateli, majxo oc'laj a c'ool d'ayon̈.</t>
44: <t>Ix a c'ub'ejel a b'a, najat ach b'atcan d'ayon̈ yic maxtzac ab' co lesal.</t>
45: <t>Icha c'alem ix on̈ utej d'a scal masanil anima.</t>
46: <t>Masanil eb' cajc'ool, ix on̈ sb'uchval eb'.</t>
47: <t>Tzon̈ te xivi yujto a eb' ajc'ol d'ayon̈ tzon̈ syam eb', tzon̈ yixtan eb', tzon̈ satanel eb', xco chi.</t>
48: <t>Tz'el val jiljon yal in sat voc' yuj cusc'olal, yujto van satel eb' vetchon̈ab'.</t>
49: <t>Man̈ ol vactej voc' yuj vab'ann̈ej syail</t>
50: <t>masanto ol yac'cot svach'c'olal Jehová d'ayon̈ d'a satchaan̈.</t>
51: <t>Te yaxo pax svab' yed' in pixan yuj tas tz'ec' d'a yib'an̈ eb' ix ix d'a yol in chon̈ab'.</t>
52: <t>A eb' ajc'ool, tzin spech eb' vach'chom malaj jab'oc in mul. Icha tz'aj spechji junoc noc' much icha chi' tzin yutej eb'.</t>
53: <t>Pitzan in val ix in syumanem eb' d'a yol jun jul, ix smacancan sti' jun jul chi' eb' yed' jun q'uen q'ueen, man̈xa b'aj syal veli.</t>
54: <t>Ichato ay in em d'a yol a a', ix in naani to yicxo chamel vaji.</t>
55: <t>Mamin Jehová, ato d'a sjulal yich jun jul tic tzin avaj d'ayach.</t>
56: <t>Ab' yoch in jaj, man̈ actej ab'an in tevi.</t>
57: <t>Ix a nitzcot a b'a d'ayin ayic ix ach vavtani, ix alan d'ayin: Man̈ ach xivoc, xa chi.</t>
58: <t>Mamin, ix in a colcanel d'a yol sc'ab' chamel.</t>
59: <t>Mamin Jehová, ojtac tas tzin utaj d'a man̈ stojolaloc tic. B'o yaj d'ayin d'a stojolal.</t>
60: <t>Ojtac tas snib'ej eb' ajc'ol d'ayin yed' tas sna eb' tzin yutej.</t>
61: <t>Mamin Jehová, ix ab' jantac chucal syal eb' d'a in patic yed' jantac tas sna eb' tzin yutej.</t>
62: <t>Jun c'u syac' eb' in yalub'tan̈ani, snaan eb' tas ol in yutoc.</t>
63: <t>Ilnab' val, c'ual d'ac'val in sb'uchan eb'.</t>
64: <t>Mamin Jehová, ac' spac d'a eb' icha val smojalil yuj tas tzin yutej.</t>
65: <t>Ac' pitb'oquel spensar eb', tzac'anb'at catab' d'a yib'an̈ eb'.</t>
66: <t>Mamin, pech eb' yed' yoval a c'ool. Satel eb' d'a yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic.</t>
